item.title: Make your own linux laptop
item.description: Make XPS13 Linux laptop 🔗筆電挑選 🔗Dell XPS13 支援 通過 Ubuntu 認證 灌系統 選擇版本 顯示卡驅動 wifi驅動 🔗待補… 雙系統 dual os 🔗 https://medium.com/@josef.andersson/dual-boot-windows-10-and-ubuntu-18-10-on-dell-xps-9370-1a77ae9716bc https://estl.tech/dual-boot-ubuntu-on-dell-xps-1365df21b947 leagcy vs uefi 🔗磁區分割 🔗itread01.com/content/1549288804.html?fbclid=IwAR17jW3QC2M0FJjNWrbI5p_BFYBmQFN4g7kmvYqyfwR7IUKzFF_5BNEz7DY Grub 🔗The Dell XPS 13 came with a 4K screen. Unfortunately, the GRUB bootloader does not scale the text so everything was really tiny. It was really hard to see what operating system was selected for boot. This AskUbuntu page has the solution. Similar to the comment by Bernard Wei, the videoinfo command did not work for me.
